description: Off-by-one buffer overflow in Basic Authentication in Acme Labs thttpd 1.95 through 2.20 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1496

description: Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 through 6.0 could allow local users to differentiate between alphanumeric and non-alphanumeric characters used in a password by pressing certain control keys that jump between non-alphanumeric characters, which makes it easier to conduct a brute-force password guessing attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1497

description: Buffer overflow in mod_bf 0.2 allows local users to execute arbitrary commands via a long script.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1498

description: Check Point VPN-1 4.1SP4 using SecuRemote returns different error messages for valid and invalid users, with prompts that vary depending on the authentication method being used, which makes it easier for remote attackers to conduct brute force attacks.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1499

description: ProFTPD 1.2.2rc2, and possibly other versions, does not properly verify reverse-resolved hostnames by performing forward resolution, which allows remote attackers to bypass ACLs or cause an incorrect client hostname to be logged.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1500

description: The glob functionality in ProFTPD 1.2.1, and possibly other versions allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU and memory consumption) via commands with large numbers of wildcard and other special characters, as demonstrated using an ls command with multiple (1) "*/..", (2) "*/.*", or (3) ".*./*?/" sequences in the argument.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1501

description: webcart.cgi in Mountain Network Systems WebCart 8.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the NEXTPAGE parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1502

description: The finger daemon (in.fingerd) in Sun Solaris 2.5 through 8 and SunOS 5.5 through 5.8 allows remote attackers to list all accounts on a host by typing finger 'a b c d e f g h'@host.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1503

description: Lotus Notes R5 Client 4.6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a Lotus Notes object with code in an event, which is automatically executed when the user processes the e-mail message.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1504

description: tinc 1.0pre3 and 1.0pre4 allows remote attackers to inject data into user sessions by sniffing and replaying packets.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1505

description: Unknown vulnerability in the file system protection subsystem in HP Secure OS Software for Linux 1.0 allows additional user privileges on some files beyond what is specified in the file system protection rules, which allows local users to conduct unauthorized operations on restricted files.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1506

description: OpenSSH before 3.0.1 with Kerberos V enabled does not properly authenticate users, which could allow remote attackers to login unchallenged.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1507

description: Buffer overflow in lpstat in SCO OpenServer 5.0 through 5.0.6a allows local users to execute arbitrary code as group bin via a long command line argument.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1508

description: geteuid in Itanium Architecture (IA) running on HP-UX 11.20 does not properly identify a user's effective user id, which could allow local users to gain privileges.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1509

description: Allaire JRun 2.3.3, 3.0 and 3.1 running on IIS 4.0 and 5.0, iPlanet, Apache, JRun web server (JWS), and possibly other web servers allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files and directories by appending (1) "%3f.jsp", (2) "?.jsp" or (3) "?" to the requested URL.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1510

description: JRun 3.0 and 3.1 running on JRun Web Server (JWS) and IIS allows remote attackers to read arbitrary JavaServer Pages (JSP) source code via a request URL containing the source filename ending in (1) "jsp%00" or (2) "js%2570".

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1511

description: Unknown vulnerability in Allaire JRun 3.1 allows remote attackers to directly access the WEB-INF and META-INF directories and execute arbitrary JavaServer Pages (JSP), a variant of CVE-2000-1050.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1512

description: Macromedia JRun 3.0 and 3.1 allows remote attackers to obtain duplicate active user session IDs and perform actions as other users via a URL request for the web application directory without the trailing '/' (slash), as demonstrated using ctx.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1513

description: ColdFusion 4.5 and 5, when running on Windows with the advanced security sandbox type set to "operating system," does not properly pass security context to (1) child processes created with <CFEXECUTE> and (2) child processes that call the CreateProcess function and are executed with <CFOBJECT> or end with the CFX extension, which allows attackers to execute programs with the permissions of the System account.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1514

description: Macintosh clients, when using NT file system volumes on Windows 2000 SP1, create subdirectories and automatically modify the inherited NTFS permissions, which may cause the directories to have less restrictive permissions than intended.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1515

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in phpReview 0.9.0 rc2 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via user-submitted reviews.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1516

description: ** DISPUTED ** RunAs (runas.exe) in Windows 2000 stores cleartext authentication information in memory, which could allow attackers to obtain usernames and passwords by executing a process that is allocated the same memory page after termination of a RunAs command.  NOTE: the vendor disputes this issue, saying that administrative privileges are already required to exploit it, and the original researcher did not respond to requests for additional information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1517

description: RunAs (runas.exe) in Windows 2000 only creates one session instance at a time, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (RunAs hang) by creating a named pipe session with the authentication server without any request for service.  NOTE: the vendor disputes this vulnerability, however the vendor also presents a scenario in which other users could be affected if running on a Terminal Server. Therefore this is a vulnerability.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1518

description: ** DISPUTED ** RunAs (runas.exe) in Windows 2000 allows local users to create a spoofed named pipe when the service is stopped, then capture cleartext usernames and passwords when clients connect to the service.  NOTE: the vendor disputes this issue, saying that administrative privileges are already required to exploit it.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1519

description: Xircom REX 6000 allows local users to obtain the 10 digit PIN by starting a serial monitor, connecting to the personal digital assistant (PDA) via Rextools, and capturing the cleartext PIN.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1520

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in user.php in PostNuke 0.64 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the uname parameter.

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the DMOZGateway module for PHP-Nuke allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the topic parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1523

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1524

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1528

description: Buffer overflow in rpc.yppasswdd (yppasswd server) in AIX allows attackers to gain unauthorized access via a long string.  NOTE: due to lack of details in the vendor advisory, it is not clear if this is the same issue as CVE-2001-0779.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1529

description: run.cgi in Webmin 0.80 and 0.88 creates temporary files with world-writable permissions, which allows local users to execute arbitrary commands.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1530

description: Buffer overflow in Claris Emailer 2.0v2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via an email attachment with a long filename.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1531

description: WebX stores authentication information in the HTTP_REFERER variable, which is included in URL links within bulletin board messages posted by users, which could allow remote attackers to hijack user sessions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-1532
